fields.name: test1
fields.label:
Test 1

Sit outside the dog's kennel, make no eye contact with the dog and remain still for about 2 minutes. How keen is the dog to gain your social interaction?

fields.name: test1result
fields.label: Result
No attempt|Some attempt|Good attempt|Becomes distressed at lack of success

fields.name: test2
fields.label:
Test 2

Make eye contact wtih the dog and follow the dogs eyes for a few seconds. Break eye contact with the dog then look back at the dog.

fields.name: test2result
fields.label: Result
Dog becomes aggressive through this process|Dog continues to stare back at you|Dog breaks eye contact and looks away|Dog is very reluctant to make eye contact with you at all

fields.name: test3
fields.label:
Test 3

Test for food aggression by giving the dog a bowl of food in its kennel. Place the bowl on the kennel floor near the front of the door. Close and secure the kennel door. As the dog is eating move your hand towards the bowl from the outside of the kennel.

fields.name: test3result
fields.label: Result
Dog shows no sign of aggression|Dog gives vocal warnings i.e. growling/snarling|Dog shows no sign of aggression|Dog gives physical warnings i.e. lunges/bites

fields.name: friendly
fields.label: Is the dog friendly towards people?

fields.name: unfriendlycirc
fields.label: If no, who is the dog unfriendly towards and any comments on why?

fields.name: cardoor
fields.label: Will the dog enter a car door or van?

fields.name: knowplay
fields.label: Does the dog know how to play?

fields.name: toysoff
fields.label: Can you take toys off the dog?

fields.name: donttouch
fields.label: Parts of the body the dog does not like being touched?
Ears|Nose|Back|Belly|Around Eyes|Feet|Tail|Front legs|Back legs|Genitals|Mouth/Teeth|Other

fields.name: walkedon
fields.label: This dog is walked on a

fields.name: offleadplay
fields.label: Off lead play, once off lead in a secure compound, does the dog

Play with Handler|Plays Alone|Plays with Toys|Jumps up at the handler|Walks with handler|Chases other dogs|Could not be let off|Has good recall|Has some recall|Has no recall|Play nicely, but can mouth
